attributes.action: introduce legislation which provides for the clear identification to the public of those drugs and medical treatments developed through any process which involves the destruction of embryos.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bearing in mind that one can make informed ethical choices about using fairly traded goods, eating dolphin-friendly tuna, using animal-friendly shampoo and how one's investments are used, it would be in-keeping, to be able to make choices about treatments which are 'friendly' to unborn human beings.
